name: .FAT File Extension
summary: Learn about .FAT files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Theme file used by Zinf, a free audio player for Unix and Windows; contains a collection of images and settings files stored in a Zip format; used to change the look and feel of the Zinf audio player.

content: FAT files are renamed .ZIP files. To examine the contents of a FAT file, either open it directly in a Zip decompression program, or rename the ".fat" file extension to ".zip" and double-click it.
Zinf stands for "Zinf Is Not FreeA*p" since it was based on the FreeAmp audio player.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
